scripts.build: sass scss/common.scss:css/common.css && sass scss/folderModal.scss:css/folderModal.css && sass scss/internetModal.scss:css/internetModal.css && sass scss/loadingScreen.scss:css/loadingScreen.css && sass scss/loginScreen.scss:css/loginScreen.css && sass scss/mainScreen.scss:css/mainScreen.css && sass scss/memoModal.scss:css/memoModal.css && sass scss/myComputerModal.scss:css/myComputerModal.css && sass scss/quizModal.scss:css/quizModal.css && sass scss/rspModal.scss:css/rspModal.css
scripts.watch:sass: sass --watch scss/common.scss:css/common.css scss/folderModal.scss:css/folderModal.css scss/internetModal.scss:css/internetModal.css scss/loadingScreen.scss:css/loadingScreen.css scss/loginScreen.scss:css/loginScreen.css scss/mainScreen.scss:css/mainScreen.css scss/memoModal.scss:css/memoModal.css scss/myComputerModal.scss:css/myComputerModal.css scss/quizModal.scss:css/quizModal.css scss/rspModal.scss:css/rspModal.css
